item.title: Fable Sig
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:30, topic:141334”][quote author=wixter link=topic=193551.msg1746801#msg1746801 date=1189473519]
Just look at the signiture, its flat, the smudging is flat, ie. no depth, i only suggested that he couldnt take it because of the way he replied. So, am i ment to lie, and say it looks excellent when imo, it doesnt, am i not allowed to express my opinion? and what gives you the right to tell me how to C&C? who the fuck are you?
[/quote]

It actually looks closer to three dimensional to me than flat.

No one asked you to lie. I’d suggest you take a leaf out of your own book and learn to read. I didn’t ask you to make it all nice and shit, because I am an asshole when I C&C also. But when I do C&C, I can back up my criticisms. I love how you’re making generic arguments that don’t even apply to me or what I said. Did I say you had to change your opinion at all or refrain from expressing it? No.

And who the fuck am I? I’m more mature than you. And that’s saying something.[/quote]

Sigged for last line

Read full topic

item.title: Fable Sig
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:26, topic:141334”][quote author=wixter link=topic=193551.msg1746423#msg1746423 date=1189467419]
You are really starting to piss me off just fucking leave it ok? Dont start to question me , trying to act smart, you asked for a rate and C&C thats what i gave, your obviously upset about it so il try it again.

Very nice sigg GG 10/10 no improvements needed your are graphics master.
[/quote]

All right. Let’s get this clear. No one gives a shit that you’re getting pissed off.

I hate assholes who give shit C&C, then the author asks for clarification, and you claim he can’t take C&C.

You said it lacks depth and tone. He asked how does it lack depth and tone. If you can’t answer that question, it isn’t C&C; it’s made up bullshit.[/quote]
Just look at the signiture, its flat, the smudging is flat, ie. no depth, i only suggested that he couldnt take it because of the way he replied. So, am i ment to lie, and say it looks excellent when imo, it doesnt, am i not allowed to express my opinion? and what gives you the right to tell me how to C&C? who the fuck are you?

Read full topic

You said it lacks depth and tone. He asked how does it lack depth and tone. If you can’t answer that question, it isn’t C&C; it’s made up bullshit.

item.title: Fable Sig
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:24, topic:141334”][quote author=wixter link=topic=193551.msg1743417#msg1743417 date=1189366035]
Ok exe just for u, the outcome lacks depth, light and tone, the “fable” text is plain and hard to see, also the “mojo muhammed” text is hard to read, i’m not overly keen on the colour, it blends well but almost too well which makes the sig seem a little plain and boring to me.
[/quote]
That isnt C&C, thats criticism dumbass.[/quote]
You are really starting to piss me off just fucking leave it ok? Dont start to question me , trying to act smart, you asked for a rate and C&C thats what i gave, your obviously upset about it so il try it again.

Very nice sigg GG 10/10 no improvements needed your are graphics master.

Its not actually plain, plain is when nothing is going on, and when its dull.

He is asking for clarification there.[/quote]
Lol clarification of what? I clarified why i didnt like it in my post when exe asked me to go into more detail. I have no reason to reply to him, I’ve oready given C&C, stop dragging this on legit.
